column5: Ice is getting thicker as i speak ....a nice cold night should help the river out good ..water is still flowing at the dam pretty good and water is still dirty so give it a couple more calm cold days and we should be back to chasing Walleye ..ill try to get out on the Main River tomorrow morning and see how conditions are ...Few nice Crappies got pulled out from the Marina today ..ill post some pictures of todays lookout on the grand when i can find my camera cord lol..Fishmaster
Thx for the update Fishmaster  Looking forward to getting back there  Cheers  Craig
Couldn't find your thread on this mornings' fishing show with Charlie Wray, but here you are on the tube!
It's in the announcements, Jed, where it belongs.
That's why I couldn't find it.
Sounds like a great ice fishing destination from what I've heard.
